entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE MORNING
BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
